Name: Rope Cow - Rope it to The Cow
About the game: Rope Cow. A cow with a dream. And a with rope. A cow who thought he was free. But he's just a cow and lives in a deception set by the farm and corporation that exploits them, milk and body. Rope swing through multiple challenges in the admitedly short and difficult story mode , and master the two freestyle levels . FEATURES Single player story mode Goal stages game mode with two stages Unique custom rope physics with moving objects Glorious satisfaction when pulling out incredible moves Tons+ of cows COW WITH ROPE Rope Cow is a handcrafted game made by a single dev with <3, for all the swinging rope and grappling-hook fans out there. Along the way, you'll help unfold a story that unveils the overwhelming illusion our protagonist cow has been living in. But this realization brings a more profound dilemma: are we cow, or are we swinger? Stay safe. Be a happy cow.
